descriptionHtml:
Name: Xandria Vampire Huntress
Version: 2.0
Date: 2012/22/07

------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

Now I am trying to introduce you my favorite companion - nordling girl Xandria.
She is  Destrucrion mage (meant to be Vampire Huntress(but do people in Skyrim seriously believe in vampires?),  also knows Dead Detection and Healing. 
Combat Style: Human Magic
But she seems to be unlucky (yes even powerful mages can meet bad days!) and very poor (look in her inventory!) and needs your help. Give her a chance and you won`t regret
She is essential and also can be married.
Initial Outfit: Warlock Black Robe
Initial Weapon: Iron Dagger
Look for her in Morthal in \"Moorside\"Inn
If you dismiss her and then wish her to follow u she will be waiting for you at the place you have left her before


What`s news in Version 2

Calculated Lvl 5-70
Minor Bugs fixed

------------------- [Install] -----------------------

ATTENTION! Before installing Vs2 you should delete SN Xandria Vs1 if you have it!
Else you will meet two Xandria in Moorside Inn.
Please copy and overwrite in the \\ Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the ChantelleV2.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod

------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------
IMPORTANT! YOU MUST HAVE APACHI SKYHAIR V1.3 AT LEAST! The mod won`t work witout this!

Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits to the modders whose mods are mentioned above!
Thanks Bethesda for the great game

Tools used
Bethesda Creation Kit


Bugs

Not detected so far



------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
Feel free to modify, reuse or reupload just give me credit.



Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
